item.title: 交易日 "万物反弹 "中的又一次 "嗖嗖 "声
item.description: 交易日【原文：TRADING DAY】

item.title: 美联储施密德称利率已 "适当调整
item.description: 堪萨斯城联邦储备银行行长杰夫-施密德（Jeff Schmid）周一表示，他不倾向于进一步降息，认为美联储在应对政策过度紧缩和过度宽松的双重风险时，应继续关注通胀过高的危险。【原文：Kansas City Federal Reserve Bank President Jeff Schmid on Monday signaled he is disinclined to cut interest rates further, arguing that as the Fed navigates between the twin risks of overly tight and overly easy policy, it should stay focused on the danger of too-high inflation.】

item.title: OpenAI 宣布 "高度重视 "企业发展，并建立了一系列合作伙伴关系
item.description: OpenAI 在周一举行的开发者大会上宣布将建立新的合作伙伴关系，将其人工智能产品应用于各行各业，旨在将其在消费者中获得的强劲势头推广到企业业务中。【原文：OpenAI touted new partnerships to incorporate its AI products across diverse industries at its developer conference on Monday, aiming to drive the strong momentum it has enjoyed among consumers to its enterprise business.】

item.title: 美国联邦通信委员会将投票加强对中国设备的限制
item.description: 美国联邦通信委员会将于本月投票表决，加强对被认为存在国家安全风险的中国公司生产的设备的限制，这是美国针对中国政府采取的一系列行动中的最新举措。【原文：The Federal Communications Commission will vote this month to tighten restrictions on equipment made by Chinese companies deemed national security risks, the latest in a series of U.S. actions targeting Beijing.】

item.title: 电动汽车制造商 Lucid 季度交付量增长但低于预期
item.description: 本周一，Lucid 公布第三季度交付量大增 46.6%，这主要得益于上周有利可图的税收减免政策到期前对电动汽车的大量需求，但该公司的业绩仍未达到华尔街预期。【原文：Lucid reported a 46.6% jump in third-quarter deliveries on Monday, driven by a rush of demand for electric vehicles before lucrative tax credits expired last week, but it still missed Wall Street expectations.】

item.title: SAIC 将以 2.05 亿美元收购 SilverEdge 政府解决方案公司
item.description: 国防承包商科学应用国际公司（Science Applications International Corp）周一表示，已同意以 2.05 亿美元现金从私募股权公司 Godspeed Capital 手中收购同行 SilverEdge Government Solutions。【原文：Defense contractor Science Applications International Corp said on Monday it had agreed to buy peer SilverEdge Government Solutions from private equity firm Godspeed Capital for $205 million in cash.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，AppLovin 因数据收集行为受到美国证券交易委员会调查
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周一援引知情人士的话报道，美国证券交易委员会一直在调查营销平台 AppLovin 的数据收集行为。【原文：The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission has been probing marketing platform AppLovin's data-collection practices, Bloomberg News reported on Monday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 尽管墨西哥集团提出了新的要约，花旗集团仍倾向于 Banamex 的 IPO 计划
item.description: 花旗集团周一在一份声明中表示，即使在收到采矿和运输集团墨西哥集团（Grupo Mexico）的新报价后，花旗集团仍计划为其墨西哥零售部门进行首次公开募股。【原文：Citigroup still plans to pursue an IPO for its Mexican retail unit even after receiving a new offer by mining and transportation conglomerate Grupo Mexico, Citi said in a statement on Monday.】

item.title: 阿根廷市场在美国支持消息传出前人心惶惶
item.description: 本周一，阿根廷比索小幅走软，而股市走高，债券价格上涨，原因是预期美国财政部将提供财政援助，以及阿根廷在本月晚些时候举行中期选举之前政治紧张局势升级。【原文：Argentina's peso weakened marginally on Monday while stocks edged up and bond prices rose in anticipation of news of financial aid from the U.S. Treasury and as political tensions in Argentina escalate before the country's midterm elections later this month.】

item.title: 美泰与 OpenAI 合作开发 Sora 2 人工智能视频模型
item.description: OpenAI 首席执行官山姆-奥特曼（Sam Altman）在周一举行的 "开发者日 "会议上表示，玩具制造商美泰正在与 OpenAI 合作，测试 ChatGPT 制造商的人工智能视频模型 Sora 2。【原文：Toymaker Mattel is partnering with OpenAI to test the ChatGPT maker's artificial-intelligence video model Sora 2, OpenAI CEO Sam Altman said at the company's Developer Day conference on Monday.】

item.title: 巴西航空工业公司正式向瑞典出售军用货运飞机，这是推动北约发展的最新举措
item.description: 巴西飞机制造商巴西航空工业公司（Embraer）周一达成了一项协议，将向瑞典出售四架军用货运飞机，以替换欧洲国家老旧的飞机，这是该公司与该地区其他国家联合采购计划下的最新交易。【原文：Brazilian planemaker Embraer tied up a deal on Monday to sell four military cargo planes to Sweden to replace the European nation's aging aircraft, the latest under a joint procurement program with other countries in the region.】

item.title: 特朗普称将从 11 月 1 日起对中型和重型卡车征收 25% 的关税
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周一在其社交媒体平台上发文称，从 11 月 1 日开始，所有进口到美国的中型和重型卡车将面临 25% 的关税税率。【原文：All medium and heavy duty trucks imported into the United States will face a 25% tariff rate staring November 1, President Donald Trump said in a post on his social media platform on Monday.】

item.title: 高通公司就智能手机芯片专利使用费在英国打赢 6.47 亿美元官司
item.description: 高通公司正在与代表智能手机用户提起的 4.8 亿英镑（约合 6.468 亿美元）的伦敦诉讼进行抗争，该诉讼指控这家芯片制造商滥用其主导地位，迫使苹果和三星支付过高的专利使用费。【原文：Qualcomm is fighting a 480 million-pound ($646.8 million) London lawsuit brought on behalf of smartphone owners, which alleges the chipmaker has abused its dominant position to force Apple and Samsung to pay inflated royalties.】

item.title: 美国称对乡村航空公司的补贴最快将于周日到期
item.description: 特朗普政府周一表示，由于政府部分停摆，美国政府一项补贴农村机场商业航空服务的计划资金最快将于周日到期。【原文：The Trump administration said Monday that funds from a U.S. government program that subsidizes commercial air service to rural airports are set to expire as soon as Sunday because of an ongoing partial government shutdown.】

item.title: 在完成 13 亿美元的私有化交易后，Heidrick & Struggles 公司业绩大涨
item.description: 海德思哲国际公司（Heidrick & Struggles International）的股价周一大涨 20%，此前这家猎头公司同意被包括 Advent International 和 Corvex Private Equity 在内的投资者财团私有化。【原文：Shares of Heidrick & Struggles International surged 20% on Monday, after the executive search firm agreed to be taken private in a deal by a consortium of investors, including Advent International and Corvex Private Equity.】

item.title: 联邦快递任命首席财务官，敲定即将分拆货运部门的领导团队
item.description: 联邦快递（FedEx）周一表示，已任命公司前高管马歇尔-威特（Marshall Witt）为货运卡车部门的财务主管，10 月 15 日起生效，从而完成了该部门的领导团队，该部门将于 2026 年 6 月分拆。【原文：FedEx said on Monday it has appointed former company executive Marshall Witt as the finance chief of its freight trucking unit, effective October 15, completing the leadership team for the division that is set to spin off in June 2026.】

item.title: 比特币在历史最高点附近徘徊
item.description: 比特币周一徘徊在历史最高点附近，全球市值最大的加密货币继续受益于投资者的强劲需求。【原文：Bitcoin hovered near its record high on Monday as the world's largest cryptocurrency by market value continued to benefit from strong demand from investors.】

item.title: 工会敦促空中交通管制员在停航情况下继续工作
item.description: 代表 13,000 多名空中交通管制员的工会周一敦促工人们在政府部分停摆期间继续坚守岗位，因为停摆要求他们停薪留职。【原文：The union representing more than 13,000 air traffic controllers on Monday urged workers to remain on the job during the ongoing partial government shutdown that requires them to work without pay.】

item.title: 备忘录称摩根大通任命希勒里和维尔茨为欧洲、中东和非洲地区联席首席执行官
item.description: 根据路透社看到的一份内部备忘录，摩根大通周一任命 Conor Hillery 和 Matthieu Wiltz 为欧洲、中东和非洲地区联席首席执行官。【原文：JPMorgan Chase on Monday named Conor Hillery and Matthieu Wiltz as co-chief executive officers for Europe, the Middle East and Africa, according to an internal memo seen by Reuters.】

item.title: 美国 9 月最后一周每周申请失业救济人数温和增长 - Haver Analytics
item.description: 哈弗分析公司（Haver Analytics）的数据显示，在 9 月份的最后一周，新申请失业救济金的美国人数量略有增加，这表明，即使招聘工作停滞不前，裁员人数仍处于较低水平。【原文：The number of Americans filing new applications for unemployment benefits increased marginally during the last week of September, data from Haver Analytics showed, pointing to a still low level of layoffs even as hiring has stalled.】

item.title: 印度 LTIMindtree 公司赢得有史以来最大一笔交易；消息来源称交易规模为 5.8 亿美元
item.description: 印度 IT 服务公司 LTIMindtree 周一宣布，该公司赢得了有史以来最大的一笔交易，两位知情人士称交易规模为 5.8 亿美元。【原文：Indian IT services company LTIMindtree announced on Monday that it had won its largest-ever deal, with two sources aware of the matter pegging the size at $580 million.】

item.title: 美国最高法院驳回软件巨头 SAP 回避竞争对手反垄断诉讼的请求
item.description: 美国最高法院周一拒绝审理欧洲最大软件制造商 SAP 为避免美国数据技术公司 Teradata 指控其违反美国反垄断法而提出的诉讼。【原文：The U.S. Supreme Court declined on Monday to hear a bid by Europe's largest software maker SAP to avoid a lawsuit by U.S. data technology company Teradata that accused it of violating American antitrust law.】

item.title: 巴里克将出售汤贡矿，交易金额高达 3.05 亿美元
item.description: 巴里克矿业公司（Barrick Mining）周一表示，将以不超过 3.05 亿美元的价格向大西洋集团（Atlantic Group）出售其在 Tongon 金矿的权益和在象牙海岸的部分资产，这家加拿大矿业公司希望借此加强其资产负债表。【原文：Barrick Mining said on Monday it will sell its interests in the Tongon gold mine and certain assets in Ivory Coast to Atlantic Group for up to $305 million as the Candian miner looks to strengthen its balance sheet.】

item.title: 行业警告：美国烈酒出口下滑，饮酒者避开美国品牌
item.description: 根据美国蒸馏酒理事会周一发布的一份报告，第二季度美国烈酒出口下降了 9%，该报告警告说，贸易紧张局势正在打击主要市场的需求。【原文：Exports of U.S. spirits fell 9% in the second quarter, according to a report by the Distilled Spirits Council of the United States published on Monday, which warned that trade tensions were hitting demand in key markets.】

item.title: 谁是巴里-魏斯，CBS 新闻的新任掌门人？
item.description: 当 Bari Weiss 走进哥伦比亚广播公司新闻频道担任总编辑时，她将带来爱德华-默罗（Edward R. Murrow）和沃尔特-克朗凯特（Walter Cronkite）的故居在其近一个世纪的历史中从未见过的东西：一位以挑战新闻业最庄严机构为职业生涯基础的领导者。【原文：When Bari Weiss walks into CBS News as editor-in-chief, she'll bring something the former home of Edward R. Murrow and Walter Cronkite has not seen in its nearly century-long history: a leader whose career has been built on challenging journalism’s most august institutions.】

item.title: 特朗普政府领导下的美国地区银行兼并势头强劲
item.description: 美国地区性银行正在加快兼并步伐，原因是人们期望特朗普政府采取更宽松的监管措施，以及寻求扩大资产负债表，以便在经济和经营压力下更好地与大型贷款机构竞争。【原文：U.S. regional banks are ramping up mergers, fueled by expectations of a lighter regulatory approach under the Trump administration and the quest for bigger balance sheets that will help compete better against larger lenders amid economic and operational pressures.】

item.title: 弗兰克-比西尼亚诺被任命为美国国税局首席执行官
item.description: 美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）周一宣布，弗兰克-比西尼亚诺（Frank Bisignano）将担任国内税收署首席执行官。【原文：Frank Bisignano will serve as chief executive officer of the Internal Revenue Service, U.S. Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent announced on Monday.】

item.title: 安进公司将以六折价格向美国消费者直销胆固醇药物
item.description: 安进公司（Amgen）周一以折扣现金价格在美国直接面向消费者销售其胆固醇药物Repatha，成为回应美国政治压力、降低药价的最新一家制药公司。【原文：Amgen on Monday launched direct-to-consumer U.S. sales of its cholesterol medication Repatha at a discounted cash price, becoming the latest pharmaceutical company responding to U.S. political pressure to lower drug prices.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织（IMF）表示：更好的政策、更深的市场有助于新兴经济体抵御冲击
item.description: 国际货币基金组织（IMF）的一项研究表明，由于新兴市场经济体制定了可信的通胀目标、改善了外汇制度并建立了强有力的财政保护机制，它们在抵御全球重大经济冲击方面变得更加出色。【原文：Emerging market economies have become better at weathering major global economic shocks thanks to their credible inflation targeting, improved foreign exchange regimes and strong fiscal guardrails, a study by the International Monetary Fund showed.】

item.title: 查特工业公司支持以 136 亿美元的价格出售给贝克休斯公司
item.description: Chart Industries 周一表示，其股东投票通过了贝克休斯对该公司的收购。【原文：Chart Industries said on Monday that its shareholders voted to approve the company's acquisition by Baker Hughes .】
